document_data.name: Tribe of the Tiger
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Tribe of the Tiger''' was a nomadic group of [[Reghedman]] [[barbarians]] living in the tundra of [[Icewind Dale]].

Like their fellow [[Tribe of the Bear (Icewind Dale)|Tribes of the Bear]] and [[Tribe of the Elk|Elk]], the Tribe of the Tiger lived in relative peace with the folks of the [[Ten Towns]].
document_data.History: By the time of the [[War of the Silver Marches]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], the [[Auril]]ian [[Bjornhild Solvigsdottir]] had become queen of the Tiger tribe. She assumed the title after her husband, [[Korold|King Korold]], was slain by a [[frost giant]].
document_data.Notable Members:
* [[Bjornhild Solvigsdottir]], a ruthless worshiper of [[Auril]]
* [[Korold]], slain king of the Tribe of the Tiger
* [[Fritha Craegmar]], a chieftain of the Tribe of the Tiger
